name: Tom Marks
body:
# Hack, Play, Learn

I had the opportunity to spend the weekend with [@Stef](http://twitter.com/stef) from [@makeshift](http://twitter.com/makeshift) and getting some insights into his philosophy of 'Hack, Play, Learn'.

At the end of the day I ended up with a small microsite showing the relative rent to earnings ratio across London which can be found http://tomdottom.github.io/we-pay-rent/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
